attributes.action: Ban homework from every uk schools
attributes.additional_details: We learn a lot in school and we’re there for 6 hours every day yet we still need to do more school work for 30 minutes to an hour. I get that it’s so we can remember it but we’re just going to go over it the next day. Homework is exhausting and sometimes we can’t do it because we might have after school  activities or personal things going on. Homework can also cause mental health problems to people because it can simply be too much for them. We need to ban homework from all schools in the uk
attributes.background: Ban homework from every uk school in every area
